page.title: 14Nabbotts C.J School
page.content: There are eight bays in the school. Each one has a sink and an art area. The rooms are mostly covered in green carpet.We have a big courtyard in the centre of the school which is opened in the summer time.It is split into two sections.Each section has a patch of artificial grass.We have a big hall which has a badminton court marked on the floor.We have bars and ropes which are attached to the wall.When the lights are switched on they start off dull and they appear to creep up to the roof getting brighter.We have quiet rooms,a music room,a library and an A.V.A room.There is a headmaster's room,a secretary's room and a staff room.We have two changing rooms with showers and toilets.
